net.corda.testing.dsl

Class LedgerDSL<T extends TransactionDSLInterpreter,L extends LedgerDSLInterpreter<? extends T>>

  • net.corda.testing.dsl.LedgerDSL<T,L>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LedgerDSLInterpreter<T>, OutputStateLookup, Verifies

    public class LedgerDSL<T extends TransactionDSLInterpreter,L extends LedgerDSLInterpreter<? extends T>>
implements LedgerDSLInterpreter<T>

    This is the class that defines the syntactic sugar of the ledger Test DSL and delegates to the contained interpreter, and what is actually used in ledger { (...) }. Add convenience functions here, or if you want to extend the DSL functionality then first add your primitive to interface LedgerDSLInterpreter and then add the convenience defaults/extension methods here.

    See Also:
    interface LedgerDSLInterpreter

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.corda.testing.dsl.Verifies

        Verifies.DefaultImpls

      • _transaction

        public WireTransaction _transaction(java.lang.String transactionLabel,
                                    TransactionBuilder transactionBuilder,
                                    Function1<? super net.corda.testing.dsl.TransactionDSLInterpreter,? extends net.corda.testing.dsl.EnforceVerifyOrFail> dsl)

        Creates and adds a transaction to the ledger.

        Parameters:
        transactionLabel - Optional label of the transaction, to be used in diagnostic messages.
        transactionBuilder - The base transactionBuilder that will be used to build the transaction.
        dsl - The dsl that should be interpreted for building the transaction.
        Returns:
        The final class WireTransaction of the built transaction.

      • _tweak

        public void _tweak(Function1<? super net.corda.testing.dsl.LedgerDSLInterpreter<? extends net.corda.testing.dsl.TransactionDSLInterpreter>,Unit> dsl)

        Creates a local scoped copy of the ledger.

        Parameters:
        dsl - The ledger DSL to be interpreted using the copy.

        Creates and adds a transaction to the ledger that will not be verified by Verifies.verifies.

        Parameters:
        transactionLabel - Optional label of the transaction, to be used in diagnostic messages.
        transactionBuilder - The base transactionBuilder that will be used to build the transaction.
        dsl - The dsl that should be interpreted for building the transaction.
